articles.content:
DEDHAM, Mass. —George Berkowitz, who founded the seafood restaurant chain Legal Sea Foods, has died in a Boston suburb. He was 97. 
Berkowitz died in his sleep on Feb. 20 in his retirement community… [+1014 chars]
